title: Mota Creates Sustainable Fine Jewelry
itunes:title: Mota Creates Sustainable Fine Jewelry
description:
Bethany Mota, Founder of Atom & Matter, discusses her move from social media influencer to creating a line of sustainable fine jewelry.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
